house_listing.house_description: Appraised for $220,000 ** breathtaking chesapeake bay views can be exclusively yours from this stunning home. Security gates, excellent storage space, elevators, pool, sparkling sandy beach, stones throw to fishing pier. Mirrored closets. Neutral ceramic tile baths. Open floor plan.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Contemporary Style, Elevator, Foyer, UtilityRoom
